string.value: Is #p1061005#, who got his herbs back, no longer suspicious of the thieves in #m103000000#? Talk to #b#p1061005##k in #b#m105040300##k.
#p1061005# says that he is sorry for being suspicious of the thieves in #m103000000# and ask you to give his apologies. Go to #b#p1052103##k and tell her that #m103000000#'s honor has been restored.

A tiny bit of my Herb is missing, but I suppose I can live with that. I was ready to give up, but I'm so glad you found it! \r\n#L0##bI only managed to find your Herb because #p1052103# in #m103000000# helped me.#l\n#k

Is that right? I thought it was the Thieves in #m103000000# who stole it. I'm so embarrassed. I shouldn't have jumped to conclusion like that. I'm sorry. Will you tell that girl, #p1052103#, that I am truly sorry?
Thank you for your help. I know it isn't easy to help someone, especially when you don't really know that person... You're even more wonderful than #p1040001# said. Thank you again.
Hmmm, if you don't tell her, #p1052103# in #m103000000# will still think that I am falsely accusing the Thieves.
Oh, Evan! So what happened? Did you catch the culprit that stole the Herb? What a relief! \r\n#L0##b#p1061005# asked me to tell you he's sorry.#l\n#k
Hehehe. #p1061005# won't blame #m103000000# anymore, right? That's excellent! I'm so relieved that the honorable name of #m103000000# has been restored. Here. This is for you.
I'm giving you this as a token of my appreciation for clearing the name of #m103000000#. Thank you again. You're strong and kind... You're simply the best!
Haven't you gone to #b#m103000000##k yet? Please tell that girl, #b#p1052103##k, that I'm very sorry.
